channel.title: Perpetually Curious
channel.description: PerpCurio's diary entries and site updates.

item.title: New Hyperfixation: Vtuber Models
item.description: After a good year or more, I seem to be out of an art rut. It started last week when I got the urge to redraw Moon Cat for a new profile picture, which I was really happy with and based the site design off of. Gotta credit Cult of the Lamb for inspiring me too. I had so much fun with that game. Then a couple of totally unexpected things happened.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Talking about why I'm working on Perpetually Curious as a site, introducing myself a bit, and comparing personal websites to slow fashion.
